data.text: @LindsayLHess Sending all the well wishes. https://t.co/JAR9ENi9LR
@megfuzzle Yes omg we had the same thing! And I feel like Merritt gets sicker so much more often than Harrison. So now we have loooooootsa germs, always.

@LindsayLHess I FEEEEEL YOU. We had RSV before Covid (thanks, preschool, even with masks) and I just about went out of my mind because it lasted 5 weeks. Despite all I do, I just catch everything the kids bring home. I want them to go to school, really I do, but the germmmmmssss
@LindsayLHess Hugs, I hope you feel better soon xx
